itunes:title: #81: Coping with Lack of Closure
title: #81: Coping with Lack of Closure
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: To close out the year, we're going to talk about how to gain closure in different types of relationships where closure may not be possible. We hope you find this helpful in case you relate to any of the causes of lack of closure!   JOIN THE...
itunes:summary:
To close out the year, we're going to talk about how to gain closure in different types of relationships where closure may not be possible. We hope you find this helpful in case you relate to any of the causes of lack of closure!
